caption.title: Map indicating the locations of farms infected during the 2003 HPAI H7N7 epidemic.
caption.p: Farms are represented by coloured dots, according to their location and inclusion in a cluster of infection. Black dots in the main map correspond to farm samples not analyzed in this study. Farm samples represented by coloured squares were used for the within-flock viral genetic analyses. In order to maintain the clarity of the figure, only the names of the farms mentioned in the main text are shown. All samples are described in details in Table S1.
